about_the_game:
VVVVV: Soundtrack is a collection of 23 different tracks from authors such as: Kevin MacLeod, Sascha Ende, HateBit and Alexander Bekker.
All tracks are presented in Mp3 format.

• VVVVV - Main Theme
• VVVVV - Game Track 1
• VVVVV - Game Track 2
• VVVVV - Game Track 3
• VVVVV - Game Track 4
• VVVVV - Game Track 5
• VVVVV - Game Track 6
• VVVVV - Game Track 7
• VVVVV - Game Track 8
• VVVVV - Game Track 9
• VVVVV - Game Track 10
• VVVVV - Game Track 11
• VVVVV - Game Track 12
• VVVVV - Game Track 13
• VVVVV - Arena Track 1
• VVVVV - Arena Track 2
• VVVVV - Arena Track 3
• VVVVV - Caves Track 1
• VVVVV - Caves Track 2
• VVVVV - Caves Track 3
• VVVVV - Boss Giant Spider
• VVVVV - Boss Hornet
• VVVVV - Dark Lord Theme (Final Battle)

Songs will be placed in your Blood Harvest 3 folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\VVVVV\soundtrack

name: VVVVV: Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: VVVVV: Soundtrack is a collection of 23 different tracks.
